justification: "each participant rated the desirability of each item for eating or giving as a gift on a scale from -50 to 50."
"Participants also rated how frequently they consumed/gifted each of the items on a scale from -50 to 50."
"We computed temporal and semantic clustering scores with the method developed by Polyn et al. (2009)… temporal clustering scores range from 0 to 1."
same sentence notes that semantic clustering is quantified with the clustering score ranging from 0 to 1.

measured_by: Recall probability as a function of serial position
justification: "Figures 2C and 2D show the aggregate probability of recall for items based on their serial position… we further explored the influence of … serial position … on recall."

measured_by: Number of unique words recalled in free-recall task
justification: "Participants appeared to have remembered a similar number of unique words… we computed … t-tests for the differences between the means."
